index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the exchange of certain City property within an area bounded by Rainier Avenue South, South Cloverdale Street; South Henderson Street and vacated 46th Avenue South (Ordinance 99986), certain City property in Block "A", Hamblet's Acre Gardens, and certain City property in Blocks 44 and 45, Plat of Lakewood, a replat of Maynard's Lake Washington Addition, and in Blocks 34 and 35, maynard's Lake Washington Addition, for certain Seattle School District No. 1 property in said area bounded by Rainier Avenue South, South Cloverdale Street, South Henderson Street and vacated 46th Avenue South and certain of said School District's property located in the Northwest 1/4 of Section 36, Township 24 North, Range 3 East, W.M., in connection with the development of the Southeast Education and Recreation Center, as contemplated in that certain Joint Use Agreement between the City and said School District authorized by Ordinance 100583.
